title: So One for All is on the PBE....
body: What happens when you kill the Elder Dragon with five Mordekaisers O_O

replies.body: A target can only have one Morde ult on it at a time. If somebody else ults you overwrite the first ult.

What if you ult a Mordekaiser that ulted a Mordekaiser that ulted a Mordekaiser that ulted a Mordekaiser that ulted ANOTHER Mordekaiser which ulted the Dragon?

Mordception.
Sounds like a job for calbel
Mind = Blown
http://i.imgur.com/Z9KVoo0.gif

that doesn't apply to dragon though, because morde doesn't _USE_ his ult in order to get the dragon, it's simply for doing damage to it.


whether that overwrites the last morde or not and therefore only the one who gets the last hit gets the dragon, I do not know.
Currently it's whichever morde last hit it.  Strangely enough though an enemy morde CAN kill the dragon ghost, and get that dragon.  So it is possible to get multiple dragon's on the field.

so what ur saying is that the dragon can just bounce between teams until the next one spawns?
so as long as both teams cooperate, everyone can get a dragon.
I need 9 more people with a PBE account and plenty of spare time.
We need Calbel...
It was like that last time One For All was out, also. I got to play it shortly after the Mord changes and can say I was quite disappointed at the lack of dragons on the rift
So at max one team can have 10 champion ghosts on the rift?
Nah, they'd have to kill each other, so only 5 should be up, with the prohibitive death timers we currently have...
One Taric gets to turn into a storm trooper.
pretty sure 5 dragons means your fps would shit bricks
im hoping that Hiemerdinger isnt allowed this time around. Holy shit he's cancer in this mode.
will be so funny so, turrets fighting turrets

> [{quoted}](name=Sisters10086,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ox87LZd4,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-21T14:37:11.168+0000)
>
> will be so funny so, turrets fighting turrets

trust me, its not. His lane pressure is so unfair that you actually cant beat him.

I played rengar vs heimer. Literally hopeless. HOPELESS.

We all died at least like 7-8 times and got like 4 teams BETWEEN ALL OF US.
Velkoz works pretty well. Same with other waveclear mages.

He's countered by heavy initiation (like {{champion:120}} ). Once laning ends and there's enough space to chase them down as 5 initiators Heim crumbles because he isn't able to set up the field with turrets to hunker down while running away.
Doesn't shaco and eve also do well since the turrets will not target until they are visable? Burst down the Heimers first.
That's why you buy a pink on a heimer if your enemy team has a shaco or evelynn.
Play AP sona, you one shot turrets and if perfect combo you one shot him too

I played my first game of it on the PBE last night. Thought it'd be a fun, short gamemode.
Instead it was a little over an hour long {{champion:26}} vs {{champion:115}} fuckfest that the Zileans eventually won.

Last time one for all came up my friends and I played a {{champion:223}} vs {{champion:222}} match that lasted for about 1hour and 40mins. The reason was We'd always lose 3-4 Kench's but we'd ace the Jinx's, however TK couldn't push a wave for shit. The game turned into a stalemate until the Jinx's finally got tired and surrendered. Both teams were down to their Nexus and the inhibs had all respawned at least 5 or 6 times each. After that match we got All For One PTSD and swore never to touch that stupid game mode again. Had those Jinx's decided to never surrender I'm pretty sure that game would've gone for the rest of the night and until the sun came up and everybody had to go to work/school. Never in the 3 years I've been playing League have I been in a match that came even close to the time length of that one. It's probably the reason I will do anything to avoid playing Tahm Kench ever again. Another friend of mine got in an {{champion:12}} vs {{champion:14}} match I believe it was. Both teams decided to all build tanks, he said at one point people started right clicking each other and going afk to get food/drink or take a bathroom break. 

All for One is by far the most evil game mode ever created disguised as something fun and innocent/silly. Don't ever go into an AfO match if you don't have 2-3hours of emergency spare time. Nobody wins those matches, they only lose slightly less.

~~Good luck in the pain olympics!~~ 
Good luck with winning some AfO!
-Vaz-
